mapper.update: update iotdb.rbook set endtime=#{endtime} where userid = #{userid} and bname = #{bname}
mapper.select: select * from iotdb.rbook order by btime desc
select * from iotdb.rbook where endtime = 0 order by btime desc
select * from iotdb.rbook where userid = (select id from iotdb.buser where name = #{username}) order by btime desc
select * from iotdb.rbook where bname = (select bname from iotdb.book where id = #{bookid}) order by btime desc
select * from iotdb.rbook where btime > #{btime} order by btime desc
select userid as data,count(userid) as count from iotdb.rbook group by data order by count desc
select bname as data,count(bname) as count from iotdb.rbook group by data order by count desc
